mapper.select:
select * from ppm_indicator_monthly_list m
and m.guid = #GUID#
and m.indicatoryear = #INDICATORYEAR#
and m.indicatormonth = #INDICATORMONTH#
and m.datasourcename = #DATASOURCENAME#
and m.instanceclassguid = #INSTANCECLASSGUID#
and m.instanceguid = #INSTANCEGUID#
and m.indicatoryear <= #OVERTIMEYEAR#
and m.indicatormonth < #OVERTIMEMONTH#
mapper.insert: insert into ppm_indicator_monthly_list (guid, indicatoryear, indicatormonth, datasourcename, instanceclassguid, instanceguid, instancetype, parentdatasource, parentguid, createtime, updatetime) values (#GUID#, #INDICATORYEAR#, #INDICATORYEAR#, #DATASOURCENAME#, #INSTANCECLASSGUID#, #INSTANCEGUID#, #INSTANCETYPE#, #PARENTDATASOURCE#, #PARENTGUID#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#)
mapper.update:
update ppm_indicator_monthly_list
indicatoryear = #INDICATORYEAR#, indicatoryear = #INDICATORYEAR#, datasourcename = #DATASOURCENAME#, instanceclassguid = #INSTANCECLASSGUID#, instanceguid = #INSTANCEGUID#, instancetype = #INSTANCETYPE#, parentdatasource = #PARENTDATASOURCE#, parentguid = #PARENTGUID#,
updatetime = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP# where guid=#GUID#
mapper.delete: delete from ppm_indicator_monthly_list where indicatoryear = #INDICATORYEAR# and indicatoryear = #INDICATORYEAR#
